casebody.data:
FORMYDUVAL
v.
BRITT. No. 357A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 24, 2007. Ronnie M. Mitchell, Coy E. Brewer, Jr., Fayetteville, for Britt. *810T. LaFontine Odom, Sr., Benton H. Walton, III, Whiteville, for Formyduval.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 12th day of January 2007 by Plaintiff for Additional Oral Argument:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 24th day of January 2007."
